String.Source: I don't really have an opinion on religion.
String.Dest: 我对宗教没有什么看法。

String.Source: Zajhirra begs the stranger to reconsider her beliefs. One must worship the Gods, lest they take away the moons.
String.Dest: 札杰拉向陌生人乞求这个陌生人重新考虑她的信仰。一个人必须崇拜众神，免得他们带走月亮。

String.Source: I don't really have an opinion on religion.
String.Dest: 我对宗教没有什么看法。

String.Source: Zajhirra begs the stranger to reconsider his beliefs. One must worship the Gods, lest they take away the moons.
String.Dest: 札杰拉乞求陌生人再考虑下他的信仰。人必须敬爱诸神，否则他们会拿走月亮。

String.Source: How do I know it isn't? I'll have to inspect it to make sure.
String.Dest: 我怎么知道它不是？我必须检查确认一下。

String.Source: Zajhirra need not prove her loyalty. She has informed Sanyon many times of where to find Talos worshippers in exchange for fine skooma.
String.Dest: 札杰拉无需证明她的忠诚。她为了交换斯库玛已经通知桑岩很多次在哪里寻找塔洛斯信徒。

String.Source: Some say the Thalmor knew when the moons would return.
String.Dest: 有人说梭默知道什么时候月亮会归来。

String.Source: Oh no, it was never a matter of when, but always a matter of how. The saviors uncovered the dawn magic, and many of us bore witness to its splendor.
String.Dest: 不，重点不是何时去做，而是如何去做。救世主们发现了黎明魔法，并且我们中的大多数人见证了其的强盛。

String.Source: Some say the Thalmor knew when the moons would return.
String.Dest: 有人说梭默知道什么时候月亮会归来。

String.Source: Zajhirra is forever grateful to her golden-skinned friends. Even now, they provide her with the skooma that keeps her close to the moons.
String.Dest: 札杰拉永远感激她黄皮肤的朋友们。即使是现在，他们还是向她提供能让她爽翻到月亮上的斯库玛。

String.Source: What issues do you have with the Khajiit Caravans?
String.Dest: 你和虎人商队有什麽问题吗？

String.Source: They are traitors.
String.Dest: 他们是叛徒。

String.Source: The Khajiit Caravans are honest merchants.
String.Dest: 虎人商队是诚实的商人。

String.Source: That is what they want you to think. Then when your back is turned, they are spreading lies about your mother.
String.Dest: That is what they want you to think. Then when your back is turned, they are spreading lies about your mother.

String.Source: The Khajiit Caravans are honest merchants.
String.Dest: 虎人商队是诚实的商人。

String.Source: They are saying she raised a litter of skooma addicts. The saviors would never speak such treachery about Zajhirra.
String.Dest: They are saying she raised a litter of skooma addicts. The saviors would never speak such treachery about Zajhirra.

String.Source: I worship darker gods, cat.
String.Dest: 我崇拜暗神，猫。

String.Source: Do not speak of such things, stranger. The dark gods live in the void. The moons must always fill that space.
String.Dest: 别这样说，外来者。黑暗之神处于虚空之中，月亮必须一直充盈那个空间。

String.Source: So that's why you tell people not to trust the caravans. This is personal.
String.Dest: 这就是你为什么告诉人们不要相信商队的原因。这也太主观了。

String.Source: That is not true! I do this for your sake, and the sake of the moons.
String.Dest: 这不是真的!看着月亮的份上，我是为了你才干的。

String.Source: So that's why you tell people not to trust the caravans. This is personal.
String.Dest: 这就是你为什么告诉人们不要相信商队的原因。这也太主观了。

String.Source: Beware, Ma'Dran's lies are as sweet as moon sugar. But the visions he paints are false. They are a pulling of the tail. A twist of the ears.
String.Dest: 当心，马'德兰的谎言像月亮糖那样甜。但他描绘的美景都是虚假的。那些是被拉扯的尾巴，被扭曲的耳朵。

String.Source: Sorry, I don't have any skooma to offer.
String.Dest: 对不起，我不提供任何斯库玛。

String.Source: That is not kind of you, stranger, to get Zajhirra's hopes up. She will have to wait for Sanyon.
String.Dest: 这不是在感谢你，陌生人，而是为了燃起札杰拉的希望。她不得不等着桑岩。

String.Source: I have skooma, but I don't think it's a good idea to feed your habit.
String.Dest: 我有斯库玛。但拿来供你过瘾可不是个好主意。

String.Source: Why not? What does Zajhirra have to do for you? Or to you? She promises she won't tell anyone.
String.Dest: Why not? What does Zajhirra have to do for you? Or to you? She promises she won't tell anyone.

String.Source: Yes, everyone knows they're traders.
String.Dest: 是的，每个人都知道他们是商人。

String.Source: No, not traders. Traitors! They sell wares and weapons to the worshippers of the false god.
String.Dest: 不，不是商人，是叛徒！他们卖物品和武器给那些伪神的信徒！

String.Source: In this scenario, everyone does not win. In fact, many will die.
String.Dest: 在这个剧本里，没有人能够获胜，实际上，许多人将会死去。

String.Source: Everyone dies. The skooma has told Zajhirra as much. This makes her feel better about all the dying.
String.Dest: Everyone dies. The skooma has told Zajhirra as much. This makes her feel better about all the dying.

String.Source: Eight, just like you.
String.Dest: 8个，和你一样。

String.Source: So you say. Zajhiira will leave it up to Sanyon to decide, when she files her report.
String.Dest: 你是说，札杰拉会把决定权留给桑岩，在她整理好她的报告后。

String.Source: Don't Khajiit celebrate the use of moon sugar and skooma?
String.Dest: 难道虎人们不会庆祝对月亮糖和斯库马的利用？

String.Source: Yes, Zajhirra told Ma'Dran as much, but he said her use was excessive. He pointed to the claw marks on her forearms, the scabs freshly torn.
String.Dest: 是啊，札杰拉跟马'德兰也是那么说的，但他跟我说我使用过度了。他指着我前臂上的爪痕，那里的伤疤刚刚被撕裂开来。

String.Source: Don't Khajiit celebrate the use of moon sugar and skooma?
String.Dest: 难道虎人们不会庆祝对月亮糖和斯库马的利用？

String.Source: She told him it wouldn't be a problem if he hadn't hidden her stash.
String.Dest: 她告诉他，如果他不把她藏起来的话就没什么问题了。

String.Source: Anyone who helps the Stormcloaks is indeed a traitor.
String.Dest: 任何帮助风暴斗篷的人都是叛徒。

String.Source: Zajhirra is glad she will not have to name you in her report. To be honest, Zajhirra tires of killing so many men.
String.Dest: 札杰拉很高兴不用在报告里写上你的名字。老实说，札杰拉已经厌倦要杀死这么多人了。

String.Source: Do you use the same couriers the Nords use?
String.Dest: 你用的信使跟诺德人的一样吗？

String.Source: Oh no, they cannot transport the skooma to Zajhirra. It is not allowed. For this, there are peddlers in Sanyon's employ.
String.Dest: 哦不，他们不能把斯库玛运到札杰拉那儿。这是不被允许的。这些都是桑岩雇佣的毒贩。

String.Source: Do you use the same couriers the Nords use?
String.Dest: 你用的信使跟诺德人的一样吗？

String.Source: You may see them on the road from time to time. They smell of hay and skeevers.
String.Dest: 你经常会在路上看到他们。身上都是一股草垫和雪鼠的味儿。

String.Source: I worship myself and myself alone.
String.Dest: 我崇拜自己，唯独自己。

String.Source: Zajhirra begs the stranger to reconsider her beliefs. One must worship the Gods, lest they take away the moons.
String.Dest: 札杰拉向陌生人乞求这个陌生人重新考虑她的信仰。一个人必须崇拜众神，免得他们带走月亮。

String.Source: I worship myself and myself alone.
String.Dest: 我崇拜自己，唯独自己。

String.Source: Zajhirra begs the stranger to reconsider his beliefs. One must worship the Gods, lest they take away the moons.
String.Dest: 札杰拉乞求陌生人再考虑下他的信仰。人必须敬爱诸神，否则他们会拿走月亮。

String.Source: But the Thalmor love the Stormcloaks. They're weakening the Empire.
String.Dest: 可是 梭默 喜欢 风暴斗篷 啊。他们在帮着削弱帝国。

String.Source: Hush! Zajhirra knows this, the stranger knows this, and the Imperials know this. But the Stormcloaks do not. And there is one in this very inn.
String.Dest: 嘘！札杰拉知道，那个陌生人知道，帝国军团也知道。但是风暴斗篷们不知道。而且这个旅馆里碰巧就有一个。

String.Source: But the Thalmor love the Stormcloaks. They're weakening the Empire.
String.Dest: 可是 梭默 喜欢 风暴斗篷 啊。他们在帮着削弱帝国。

String.Source: But to your point, Ma'Dran does not help the Stormcloaks because the saviors ask him to. He does it for gold.
String.Dest: But to your point, Ma'Dran does not help the Stormcloaks because the saviors ask him to. He does it for gold.

String.Source: Well, are you? Unnecessary? Or is there some skill set you possess?
String.Dest: 那么，你需要吗？没有必要？还是你用了什么技法让你已经有了。

String.Source: Zajhirra will do whatever she is asked, provided she is given skooma, or gold to buy it.
String.Dest: 无论她要求什么，札杰拉都会去做，不论是提供给她斯库玛，还是出钱去帮她买。

String.Source: Well, are you? Unnecessary? Or is there some skill set you possess?
String.Dest: 那么，你需要吗？没有必要？还是你用了什么技法让你已经有了。

String.Source: For Ma'Dran, she cooked and cleaned. She set up the tent, and kept the fire warm to remind us all of home.
String.Dest: For Ma'Dran, she cooked and cleaned. She set up the tent, and kept the fire warm to remind us all of home.

String.Source: Well, are you? Unnecessary? Or is there some skill set you possess?
String.Dest: 那么，你需要吗？没有必要？还是你用了什么技法让你已经有了。

String.Source: Now it is Ma'jhad who cooks, and Ra'zhinda who keeps his fire warm. Zajhirra should not have taught them how.
String.Dest: 现在是马哈德在烹饪，而拉辛达则在生火。札杰拉并没有教过他们该怎样去做那些事情。

String.Source: If you send innocents to their death, you're a murderer.
String.Dest: 害死无辜之人，就是谋杀。

String.Source: Zajhirra agrees. But these are not innocents. These are Talos worshippers. The saviors of the moon have stated they must be punished.
String.Dest: 札杰拉同意。但没必要对此抱有同情。月亮的拯救者们已经示意，那些塔洛斯的支持者们应当被惩罚。

String.Source: If you send innocents to their death, you're a murderer.
String.Dest: 害死无辜之人，就是谋杀。

String.Source: Zajhirra does not like the killing so much, but as she has said before, sometimes the only way to open their eyes is to close them.
String.Dest: 札杰拉不喜欢杀戮。但她说过，有时候改变他人想法的唯一办法就是杀了他们。

String.Source: A murder party? I love those! I wish I was invited.
String.Dest: 一个谋杀聚会？我喜欢！能邀请我就好了。

String.Source: It is Zajhirra's job to find the parties, and to keep the skooma. You will not take this from her. You must find your own savior to help you.
String.Dest: It is Zajhirra's job to find the parties, and to keep the skooma. You will not take this from her. You must find your own savior to help you.

String.Source: Why do you consider the Thalmor your savior?
String.Dest: 你为什么把梭默当成救星呢？

String.Source: Do you not know? They are the wielders of the Dawn Magicks, ancient spells that brought the moons back to Elsweyr, and saved all of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 你不知道吗？他们是黎明魔法的使用者，用远古咒语将月亮带回艾斯维尔，并挽救了整个泰姆瑞尔大陆。

String.Source: Listen to me stranger, and listen well. The Khajiit Caravans are not to be trusted.
String.Dest: 听我说陌生人，听好咯。你可千万别去相信虎人商队。

String.Source: Sanyon says betrayers shave their rear ends, to resemble the Nord ones they are fond of licking.
String.Dest: 桑岩说那些叛徒们把自己屁股上的毛全都剃光了，要跟诺德人混就得爱上舔字诀

String.Source: But Zajhirra, she is loyal to the Thalmor. Her rear end is not shaved.
String.Dest: 不过札杰拉是忠于梭默的。她尾巴末端没有剃毛。

String.Source: Merchants are only loyal to gold.
String.Dest: 商人的忠诚都是给金子的。

String.Source: If you are loyal to gold you betray the saviors. Zajhirra told Sanyon that Ma'Dran was guilty of many such betrayals.
String.Dest: 如果你把忠诚给了金子那你就背弃了救世主。札杰拉对桑岩说过马‘德兰就是这样一个背叛者。

String.Source: Are the Thalmor encouraging the war?
String.Dest: 梭默在战争中被激励了吗？

String.Source: Zajhirra did not say this. That is the mead talking. It does not have nice things to say like the skooma.
String.Dest: Zajhirra did not say this. That is the mead talking. It does not have nice things to say like the skooma.

String.Source: There are Nine Divines and I pray to all of them.
String.Dest: 天上有着九圣灵，我会向他们中的每一个祈祷。

String.Source: Nine, you say? This will have to go into Zajhirra's report. Sanyon cannot ignore this blasphemy for much longer.
String.Dest: 九圣灵啊，你说什么？我必须得把这写进报告。桑岩不能再忍受这种亵渎神灵的行为了。

String.Source: The Stormcloaks are fighting for honor and principle.
String.Dest: 风暴斗篷是为了荣誉与信念而战的！.

String.Source: It would not be wise for you to praise the usurpers. Zajhirra will be forced to name you in her report.
String.Dest: 聪明点儿的话就别去赞美那个篡位者。札杰拉会被迫把你的名字写入她的报告的。

String.Source: I'm still not following you. Traders sell to all kinds of folk.
String.Dest: 我仍然不会跟随你。商人能说服所有人。

String.Source: It seems the stranger's ears are full of yarn. They are not traders, they are trai-tors. Betrayers, back-stabbers, infidels, dogs.
String.Dest: 看来陌生人听不懂人话。他们不是商人，他们是叛徒，背信者，中伤者，异教徒，走狗。

String.Source: That must have been some magic.
String.Dest: 那一定是些魔法。

String.Source: Oh yes, many in Elsweyr have told the story of how the saviors filled the sky with light, and when it faded, the moons stood in its place.
String.Dest: 哦是的，很多艾斯维尔人都能给你讲那个救世主如何用光芒照耀整个天空，当光芒褪去，月亮又重现在本来地方的故事。

String.Source: That must have been some magic.
String.Dest: 那一定是些魔法。

String.Source: Zajhirra is forever grateful to her golden-skinned friends. Even now, they provide her with the skooma that keeps her close to the moons.
String.Dest: 札杰拉会永远感谢她那些金色皮肤的朋友们。就算现在，他们也会提供给她斯库玛，让她更靠近月亮。

String.Source: Who is Sanyon?
String.Dest: 桑岩是谁?

String.Source: He is a Thalmor agent and Zajhirra's friend. She sends him letters by courier. It has the list of names and locations of potential Talos worshippers.
String.Dest: 他是一名梭默代理人，也是札杰拉的朋友。我给他寄了封信。信里详细列出了有潜在成为塔洛斯信徒可能性的家伙的名字和位置。

String.Source: Who is Sanyon?
String.Dest: 桑岩是谁?

String.Source: Sanyon then kills the infidels, and makes a tableau. That is a fancy Elf word for a murder party.
String.Dest: Sanyon then kills the infidels, and makes a tableau. That is a fancy Elf word for a murder party.

String.Source: Who is Sanyon?
String.Dest: 桑岩是谁?

String.Source: This gets the attention of the Stormcloaks, who then redouble their efforts against the Empire.
String.Dest: 这吸引了暴风斗篷的注意力，他们随后投入了成倍的精力对抗帝国。

String.Source: Who is Sanyon?
String.Dest: 桑岩是谁?

String.Source: The saviors get stronger, and Zajhirra gets her skooma. Everybody wins.
String.Dest: 救世主们变强了，札杰拉得到了她的斯库玛，共赢啊。

String.Source: No, they're not.
String.Dest: 不，他们不是的。

String.Source: Why do you insist on defending them? Who are you, anyway? How many Divines do you pray to?
String.Dest: 为什么你非要保护他们？你到底是谁？你向多少神灵祈祷才得以至此？

String.Source: Talos worshippers deserve nothing save a painful and inglorious death.
String.Dest: 没有什么值得去挽救塔洛斯崇拜者痛苦而可耻的死亡。

String.Source: Zajhirra does not want them to feel pain. She simply wishes to save them, just as the Thalmor saved the moons.
String.Dest: 札杰拉并不想让他们吃皮肉之苦，只是想救他们罢了。就像梭默们复原月亮般。

String.Source: Talos worshippers deserve nothing save a painful and inglorious death.
String.Dest: 没有什么值得去挽救塔洛斯崇拜者痛苦而可耻的死亡。

String.Source: But she does not know any dawn magicks like the Elves do. She owns no staff. But Sanyon gave her an ink wand to write down their names.
String.Dest: 但是她和精灵不同她对黎明魔法一无所知。她没有法杖。但是桑岩给了她一只墨水魔棒来写下他们的名字。

String.Source: Yes, your mind appears to be in perfect health for a crazy person.
String.Dest: 是的，你的心灵看起来非常健康，就一个疯子来说。

String.Source: Zajhirra was only trying to warn the stranger. You did not have to return her favor with insults.
String.Dest: 札杰拉只是想警告那陌生人。你没必要以侮辱回应她的好意。

String.Source: It all makes sense now. The Thalmor and the Stormcloaks are working together.
String.Dest: 这下就对上号了，那帮梭默是跟风暴斗篷一伙的。

String.Source: Zajhirra thinks your theory is crazier than a barrel full of Orcs.
String.Dest: 札杰拉觉得你的说法比一打兽人的说辞都疯狂。

String.Source: It all makes sense now. The Thalmor and the Stormcloaks are working together.
String.Dest: 这下就对上号了，那帮梭默是跟风暴斗篷一伙的。

String.Source: Now she is convinced your skooma is better than Sanyon's. You must bring more. Zajhirra will do whatever you please.
String.Dest: 现在她很确信你的斯库玛比桑岩的好。你得多带些过来。札杰拉会为你做任何事。

String.Source: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?
String.Dest: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?

String.Source: He runs the caravan in Solitude and Windhelm. Zajhirra used to be under his employ, until he accused her of being a skooma addict.
String.Dest: 他的商队往来于独孤城和风盔城之间。我过去在他手下做事，直到他指责我是个斯库玛上瘾者。

String.Source: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?
String.Dest: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?

String.Source: His claws cut her deep. He is the one who introduced her to it. Then he said she was chasing customers away, that her shaking was bad for business.
String.Dest: 他的利爪把札杰拉抓的很深。就是他介绍她干这个工作，然后他说她赶跑了顾客。说她的颤抖对生意不好。

String.Source: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?
String.Dest: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?

String.Source: Worse yet, he said she was unstable. That her mind was unhealthy. But if her mind were truly sick, she wouldn't have uncovered Ma'Dran's true motive.
String.Dest: 更糟糕的是，他说她情绪不稳定。说她的脑子坏掉了。但是，如果她的脑子真的不正常，她就不会发现马'德兰的真实动机。

String.Source: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?
String.Dest: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?

String.Source: Yes, Zajhirra is bad for business. The business of Ma'Dran's coin purse.
String.Dest: Yes, Zajhirra is bad for business. The business of Ma'Dran's coin purse.

String.Source: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?
String.Dest: What issues do you have with Ma'Dran?

String.Source: What do you mean by Ma'Dran's coin purse?
String.Dest: What do you mean by Ma'Dran's coin purse?

String.Source: He wanted a larger share of the profits, but he could not rid himself of the bodyguards. Yet his assistant...he found her unnecessary.
String.Dest: 他一直想分到更多的利润，可又不能解雇自己的保镖。不过他觉得的女助手好像没什么存在的必要。

String.Source: Is that what you're doing here? Acting as an informer?
String.Dest: 这就是你在这里做的事情？表现得像一个线人？

String.Source: Yes, Zajhirra finds Talos worshippers and reports them to Sanyon. Right now she is shadowing the one called Sonja.
String.Dest: 是的,札杰拉发现了几名塔洛斯信徒并报告给了桑岩。现在她正暗中盯着其中一个叫索尼娅的。

String.Source: Is that what you're doing here? Acting as an informer?
String.Dest: 这就是你在这里做的事情？表现得像一个线人？

String.Source: She is waiting for her to leave the inn and contact her fellow Talos worshippers. Zajhirra has waited a very long time.
String.Dest: 她在等她离开旅馆去和她的塔洛斯信徒同伴们见面。札杰拉已经等了好长时间了。

String.Source: I wish I could help you, but I don't have any skooma on me.
String.Dest: 我希望我能帮你，但我身上没有斯库玛。

String.Source: Then I beg you, go find some. She is desperate for skooma, but she promised Sanyon she would wait here and collect information on the infidels.
String.Dest: Then I beg you, go find some. She is desperate for skooma, but she promised Sanyon she would wait here and collect information on the infidels.

String.Source: Sure. Have a bottle on me.
String.Dest: Sure. Have a bottle on me.

String.Source: Smoke of the sugar, breath of the gods! Tell me your secrets, little bottle...tell me what I need to know.
String.Dest: Smoke of the sugar, breath of the gods! Tell me your secrets, little bottle...tell me what I need to know.

String.Source: Sure. Have a bottle on me.
String.Dest: Sure. Have a bottle on me.

String.Source: But not here. Not in the presence of these infidels. They will use it against us, as Ma'Dran has.
String.Dest: But not here. Not in the presence of these infidels. They will use it against us, as Ma'Dran has.

String.Source: You mentioned you have a taste for skooma.
String.Dest: 你说你尝过斯库玛.

String.Source: Why? Do you have some? Why are we wasting time talking?
String.Dest: 为什么？难道你有吗？那我们干什么浪费时间说话？

String.Source: Perhaps Ma'Dran cared about your health and wanted you to get better.
String.Dest: 可能马'德兰关心你的健康，想要你好起来。

String.Source: Khajiit wishes it were so, but Ma'Dran cares only for the health of his pockets. That is why he betrayed Zajhirra and the saviors.
String.Dest: Khajiit wishes it were so, but Ma'Dran cares only for the health of his pockets. That is why he betrayed Zajhirra and the saviors.

String.Source: They seem fairly neutral to me.
String.Dest: 我看他们非常自然啊。

String.Source: As neutral as the dark side of Secunda. For I have witnessed firsthand the sale of weapons to none other than Stormcloaks.
String.Dest: 赛库达不见天日的阴面都比他们中立。我曾目睹过他们直接把武器卖给风暴斗篷。

String.Source: The Thalmor are a blight on this land that must be purged.
String.Dest: 梭默是这块土地上务必清除的毒瘤。

String.Source: Blight? Zajhirra does not know what kind of skooma you are huffing, but she would like you to share.
String.Dest: Blight? Zajhirra does not know what kind of skooma you are huffing, but she would like you to share.

String.Source: The Thalmor are a blight on this land that must be purged.
String.Dest: 梭默是这块土地上务必清除的毒瘤。

String.Source: The saviors brought back the moons to Elsweyr. The Eight have crowned them the true rulers of Tamriel. Zajhirra tells them where to hunt the ninth.
String.Dest: 救世主把月亮带回了艾斯维尔。八圣灵将它们加冕于泰姆瑞尔大陆真正的统治者。札杰拉告诉了他们哪里能寻到第九圣灵。

String.Source: I want to go back to my earlier questions.
String.Dest: 让我们回到先前的问题上。

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: I bet Talos' fingers smell like juniper berries.
String.Dest: 我打赌塔洛斯的手指闻起来肯定像杜松子。

String.Source: Zajhirra does not think so. She has sniffed many fingers, and done many unsavory things for her precious skooma.
String.Dest: Zajhirra does not think so. She has sniffed many fingers, and done many unsavory things for her precious skooma.

String.Source: I bet Talos' fingers smell like juniper berries.
String.Dest: 我打赌塔洛斯的手指闻起来肯定像杜松子。

String.Source: Most Nord fingers smell of mead honey, and blood. But those who pray to Talos like to make wreaths out of snowberries.
String.Dest: 大多数诺德人的手指闻起来都是蜂蜜酒的香甜中掺杂着一丝血腥味儿。而那些向塔洛斯祈祷的人则喜欢用雪浆果做花环。

String.Source: I bet Talos' fingers smell like juniper berries.
String.Dest: 我打赌塔洛斯的手指闻起来肯定像杜松子。

String.Source: That is how Zajhirra tells them apart.
String.Dest: That is how Zajhirra tells them apart.

String.Source: I know what you mean. I feel the same way about murder.
String.Dest: 我明白你的意思. 我们对谋杀的看法相同.

String.Source: You frighten this Khajiit, stranger. She is talking of bliss. You speak of pain. It is not a feeling she wishes to chase.
String.Dest: 你吓到我了，陌生人。我在述说幸福，而你却在低诉痛苦。我并不想追求这种感觉。

String.Source: You give me some information first, and there might be a bottle in it for you.
String.Dest: 首先你得给我一些信息。然后才有可能得到一些装有它的瓶子。

String.Source: That is not how Sanyon does it. It is always skooma first, talk later. Zajhirra does not trust strangers.
String.Dest: 那不是桑岩的作法。一直是斯库玛第一位，然后再谈。札杰拉不相信陌生人。

String.Source: Sounds dangerous.
String.Dest: 听起来有点危险。

String.Source: It is not. Although it is true that some find such behavior...sickening.
String.Dest: It is not. Although it is true that some find such behavior...sickening.

String.Source: Sounds dangerous.
String.Dest: 听起来有点危险。

String.Source: But Zajhirra does not care what Ma'Dran says. It is not wrong to surrender to a feeling.
String.Dest: 但札杰拉并不在乎马'德兰说的话。跟着感觉走也不错。

String.Source: I certainly understand the allure.
String.Dest: 我当然了解这种魅力。

String.Source: Then you are wiser than most. Still, some find such behavior...sickening.
String.Dest: 那么你就比大多数人聪明多了。不过，有些人觉得这种勾当相当的，额，无耻。

String.Source: I certainly understand the allure.
String.Dest: 我当然了解这种魅力。

String.Source: But Zajhirra does not care what Ma'Dran says. It is not wrong to surrender to a feeling.
String.Dest: 但札杰拉并不在乎马'德兰说的话。跟着感觉走也不错。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: You have been kind enough to provide Zajhirra with a bottle, so perhaps you already know the answer. But I will explain, if that is your wish.
String.Dest: 你给札杰拉一瓶斯库玛已经够好的了。因此也许你已经知道答案了，但是我会解释的，如果你想如此的话。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: It is best smoked, although the taste is sweet, but Zajhirra does not use skooma for the taste.
String.Dest: 这是最好的烟，虽然味道有点甜，但札杰拉没有为了调味往里面添加斯库玛。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: The mind is flooded with pleasure, and in that moment, anything is possible, and everyone loves you.
String.Dest: 当心中充满了愉悦之感，这一刻你无所不能，而且每个人都是爱你的。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: And when it's over, you will do anything...scratch and claw, chase your tail, and tear out your fur to get that feeling again.
String.Dest: 当一切结束之时，为了再次得到那种感觉，你会不惜一切代价……即使这要你放弃自己的尊严。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: It is best smoked, although the taste is sweet, but Zajhirra does not use skooma for the taste.
String.Dest: 这是最好的烟，虽然味道有点甜，但札杰拉没有为了调味往里面添加斯库玛。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: The mind is flooded with pleasure, and in that moment, anything is possible, and everyone loves you.
String.Dest: 当心中充满了愉悦之感，这一刻你无所不能，而且每个人都是爱你的。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: And when it's over, you will do anything...scratch and claw, chase your tail, and tear out your fur to get that feeling again.
String.Dest: 当一切结束之时，为了再次得到那种感觉，你会不惜一切代价……即使这要你放弃自己的尊严。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: Are there any side effects to using skooma?
String.Dest: Are there any side effects to using skooma?

String.Source: Zajhirra does not know what this means, this "side effect." She experiences many effects, and they are all good.
String.Dest: 札杰拉不懂你说的这个什么“副作用”是啥意思。她经历过很多效果，而且都是好的效果。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: Are there any side effects to using skooma?
String.Dest: Are there any side effects to using skooma?

String.Source: Sometimes Zajhirra sees things. Other times she hears them. They all give her comfort.
String.Dest: 有时候札杰拉会看到一些东西。有时候她会听见。这些都给她带来安慰。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: Are there any side effects to using skooma?
String.Dest: Are there any side effects to using skooma?

String.Source: On occasion, she experiences things beyond explanation. Millions of years in a matter of seconds. The taste of music. Deep echoes of silence.
String.Dest: 有时她会经历一些难以言明的事情。诸如在几秒内消逝的漫长时间，音乐的味道，还有沉默的回声。

String.Source: What does skooma feel like?
String.Dest: 磕了斯库玛的感觉如何？

String.Source: Are there any side effects to using skooma?
String.Dest: Are there any side effects to using skooma?

String.Source: She wakes up clutching a bottle, knowing an entire world was inside, and she longs to consume another. She yearns for one more breath.
String.Dest: 她醒来时紧紧的攥着一瓶，知道瓶子里蕴含着一个世界。而她渴望再喝掉一瓶斯库玛。她渴望再次呼吸。

String.Source: You're a Thalmor informant?
String.Dest: 你是梭默的线人？

String.Source: Yes. Zajhirra does good work too. The bodies west of Riverwood? That was her doing.
String.Dest: 是的，札杰拉干的也很漂亮。溪木镇西边的尸体？那是她的杰作。

String.Source: You're a Thalmor informant?
String.Dest: 你是梭默的线人？

String.Source: People come to pray to the false god. Zajhirra sometimes warns them that Talos is but a man.
String.Dest: 人们来向伪神祈祷。札杰拉有时会提醒他们，塔洛斯不过是个人类。

String.Source: You're a Thalmor informant?
String.Dest: 你是梭默的线人？

String.Source: Yet still they pray. Zajhirra has no choice but to tell the saviors of their blasphemy. She thinks it would be best if they die.
String.Dest: 但他们仍在祈祷。札杰拉别无选择，只能告诉他们已经亵渎了救世主。她认为他们最好都去死。

String.Source: You're a Thalmor informant?
String.Dest: 你是梭默的线人？

String.Source: Then they can meet Talos in the next world, where he is just another man scratching himself and smelling his fingers.
String.Dest: 塔洛斯在另一个世界不过是又一个抓耳挠腮的人类而已，那么现在他们可以去见他了。

String.Source: By the Gods, you are a fool. A bit of a victim, but mostly a fool.
String.Dest: By the Gods, you are a fool. A bit of a victim, but mostly a fool.

String.Source: Why must you mock Zajhirra, stranger? She is only answering your questions.
String.Dest: 为什么你要假扮札杰拉，陌生人？她只是在回答你的问题而已。

String.Source: By the Gods, you are a fool. A bit of a victim, but mostly a fool.
String.Dest: By the Gods, you are a fool. A bit of a victim, but mostly a fool.

String.Source: The Thalmor have been good to Zajhirra. They have allowed her to live her life whereas others only scold.
String.Dest: 梭默对札杰拉很好。在其他人只能开口谩骂的时候，他们允许她去过自己的生活。

String.Source: There are rumors of a Talos shrine east of Cradlecrush Rock. This information is worth at least two more bottles.
String.Dest: There are rumors of a Talos shrine east of Cradlecrush Rock. This information is worth at least two more bottles.

String.Source: Your Wood Elf companion...Zajhirra has seen him before...but she is not sure where.
String.Dest: Your Wood Elf companion...Zajhirra has seen him before...but she is not sure where.

String.Source: Your Wood Elf companion...Zajhirra has seen him before...but she is not sure where.
String.Dest: Your Wood Elf companion...Zajhirra has seen him before...but she is not sure where.

String.Source: Need something?
String.Dest: 有事吗？

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: What can Zajhirra do for you?
String.Dest: What can Zajhirra do for you?

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Sugar and sands, friend.
String.Dest: 糖和沙子，朋友.

String.Source: Moons guide you.
String.Dest: 愿月光指引你。

String.Source: May your road lead you to warm sands.
String.Dest: 愿你的前路是温暖的沙地。

String.Source: May your road lead you to warm sands, and good skooma.
String.Dest: May your road lead you to warm sands, and good skooma.

String.Source: Keep an eye out for Talos worshippers.
String.Dest: 随时留意塔洛斯的信徒。

String.Source: Remember what I said about the caravans.
String.Dest: 记住我说的那个商队。

String.Source: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
String.Dest: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
